3: Staessen, my man! Haven't seen you around these parts in a while.
Yeah, it's been quite some time.
Yeah, the ARU has had their hands full with Derek and Amberia. We've left you out in the cold.
Long time no see, Antonov, Sergey.
Oh, it's not worth your time here in the Border Commune, all out in the rurals.
Don't say that, Sergey. We want to solve your problems, too.
Save it, Staessen. If you give us enough supplies, maybe we'll consider changing our standpoint.
So, what's the reason behind this long-awaited reunion?
Indeed. What brings you here, Staessen?
Sergey, what did I say? Do you still think we can live in harmony with these fools, cheapskates, and scum of the earth on this ice field?
As I said before, give your ****ing delusions up, son of a*****.
Just say it. What's the matter?
This isn't just a 'matter.' You're outright killing us.
Staessen, you didn't ****ing come here to take back the Moses icebreakers without knowing, did you? Or do you believe the lies the Kyaranta dumbasses told you?
Forget it, I'll quit the bull****. Let's take you to the dock.
It's not safe along the way. Watch out for Corrupted.
